mapper.update: UPDATE users SET user_point = ( SELECT SUM(point_price) FROM point WHERE point_id = #{point_id}) WHERE user_id = #{point_id}
mapper.select:
SELECT point_time, point_history, point_price FROM point WHERE point_id = #{point_id}
AND point_time >= #{startDate}
AND point_time <= DATE_ADD(#{endDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND point_history LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_keyword}, '%')
AND point_price < 0
AND point_price >= 0
ORDER BY point_time DESC
